alert.note: Alert for Sheep Range; Spring Mountains-Red Rock Canyon (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued March 21 at 2:51AM PDT until March 22 at 5:00PM PDT by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM PDT WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations 1 to 2 feet, locally up to 3 feet. Winds gusting as high as 55 mph. * WHERE...Sheep Range and Spring Mountains. * WHEN...From 5 AM Tuesday to 5 PM PDT Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Sheep Range; Spring Mountains-Red Rock Canyon
